<script type="text/javascript">
//解決IE8,IE9不支持console的问题
(function() {
    var method;
    var noop = function() {};
    var methods = [
        'assert', 'clear', 'count', 'debug', 'dir', 'dirxml', 'error',
        'exception', 'group', 'groupCollapsed', 'groupEnd', 'info', 'log',
        'markTimeline', 'profile', 'profileEnd', 'table', 'time', 'timeEnd',
        'timeStamp', 'trace', 'warn'
    ];
    var length = methods.length;
    var console = (window.console = window.console || {});

    while (length--) {
        method = methods[length];

        // Only stub undefined methods.
        if (!console[method]) {
            console[method] = noop;
        }
    }
}());
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function () {
        var html = document.getElementsByTagName("html")[0];
        var width = Math.min(document.documentElement.clientWidth, 790);
        width = width < 320 ? 320 : width;
        if (document.documentElement.clientWidth <= 1024) {
            html.style.fontSize = width / 790 * 79 + 'px';
        }
        if (window.addEventListener) {
            window.addEventListener('resize', resizeHandler);
        }
        else if (window.attachEvent) {
            window.attachEvent('onresize', resizeHandler);
        }
        function resizeHandler() {
            if (document.documentElement.clientWidth <= 1024) {
                var width = Math.min(document.documentElement.clientWidth, 790);
                width = width < 320 ? 320 : width;
                html.style.fontSize = width / 790 * 79 + 'px';
            } else {
                html.style.fontSize = "16px";
            }
        };
    })();
</script>

                        <div class="text">
                            <div class="text-title">
    <h1>
                    没有比这更高清的《兰亭序》了，耐心欣赏也许会有新的发现
                <span class="article-tag">
                 </span>
    </h1>
            <div class="article-info">
        <span class="time" id="news-time" data-val="1519575554000">2018-02-26 00:19</span>
        <span data-role="original-link">来源:<a href="http://www.sohu.com/?spm=smpc.content.content.1.1548666901115Aqjfpz4" target="_blank" data-spm-data="1">墨香阁书画拍卖</a></span>
                <span class="tag">
                                  </span>
            </div>
</div>
<article class="article" id="mp-editor">
      <p data-role="original-title" style="display:none">原标题：没有比这更高清的《兰亭序》了，耐心欣赏也许会有新的发现</p>
            <p><span></span><span style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-size: 16px;">☞</span></span><span style="font-size: 16px;"></span><span style="font-size: 16px;"></span></p> 
<p><img src="./冯承素摹本_files/deb5835157c84939bb9c63127da03643.jpeg"></p> 
<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px;">《兰亭序》冯承素摹本</span></p> 
<p style="text-align: justify;">没有比这更高清的《兰亭序》了！这是故宫博物院使用最新数码技术高清微距拍摄的冯摹本《兰亭序》，堪称书法里的显微镜成像图，丝毫见诸，高清到似乎能听见笔触的声音！请耐心慢慢观赏，也许对你会而言，会有新的发现！ </p> 
<p><img height="6072" width="640" src="./冯承素摹本_files/232c611444764a0baaf4f264cd1d32b3.jpeg"></p> 
<p><img height="6027" width="640" src="./冯承素摹本_files/7018933361f64861831586128943316f.jpeg"></p> 
<p><img height="5928" width="640" src="./冯承素摹本_files/f0dd6a767f7047aea1e8e243a18a79a0.jpeg"></p> 
<p><img height="4987" width="640" src="./冯承素摹本_files/3bec1209c22c44ac991f6b951a390b06.jpeg"></p> 
<p><img height="6682" width="598" src="./冯承素摹本_files/e17b28d9175d4b689752d73e5d4373e4.jpeg"></p> 
<p><img height="6825" width="586" src="./冯承素摹本_files/f8c367ff87b24f1f881e4b9ef838a246.jpeg"></p> 
<p><img height="6424" width="622" src="./冯承素摹本_files/c316eaaecb0349a49d1fa4e4e3a734f5.jpeg"></p> 
<p><img height="4622" width="400" src="./冯承素摹本_files/60d1daa302c546a7854a06b8e4b64487.jpeg"></p> 
<p><img height="5910" width="640" src="./冯承素摹本_files/6d81cc34825f49b0abe87af1a3d9f52c.jpeg"></p> 
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 16px;">（图文来自网络，版权归原作者所有）</span><a href="http://www.sohu.com/?strategyid=00001&amp;spm=smpc.content.content.2.1548666901115Aqjfpz4" target="_blank" title="点击进入搜狐首页" id="backsohucom" style="white-space: nowrap;" data-spm-data="2"><span class="backword"><i class="backsohu"></i>返回搜狐，查看更多</span></a></p>      <p data-role="editor-name">责任编辑：<span></span></p>
</article>
<script>
    (function() {
        function getBrandHtml() {
            var brands = [],
            html = '';
                        for(var i = 0; i < brands.length; i++) {
                var brand = brands[i];
                if(brands.length == i+1) {
                    html+= '<a class="username-link" href="'+brand.url+'" target="_blank">'+brand.name+'</a>';
                } else {
                    html+= '<a class="username-link" href="'+brand.url+'" target="_blank">'+brand.name+'</a>、';
                }
            }
            return html;

        };
        if(document.getElementById('linkBtn')){
            document.getElementById('linkBtn').onclick = function() {
                $('#brands').removeClass('brand');
                $('#tipInfo').text('已实名回应');
                $('#linkBtn').remove();
                $('.real-response .content').css('line-height', '20px');
                $('.real-response .time').css('line-height', '20px');
            };
    
            document.getElementById('brands').innerHTML = getBrandHtml();
        };
    })();
</script>

    <div class="hot-article clear bord" id="hot-news" data-spm="tw"><div class="titleR">
    <span class="tt">24小时热文</span>
</div>



<div class="pic-txt clear " data-loc="3" data-media-id="206804" data-spm-type="resource" data-spm-data="1" data-spm-content="a/273568422_206804">
    <div class="pic img-do">
        <a target="_blank" href="http://www.sohu.com/a/273568422_206804?scm=undefined&amp;_f=index_betapagehotnews_1&amp;spm=smpc.content.tw.1.1548666901115Aqjfpz4" data-spm-data="1">
            <img alt="" src="./冯承素摹本_files/3109191486294238989d470bdabcc40f.jpeg">
            
            <span class="sn">1</span>
            
        </a>
    </div>
    <h4>
        <a target="_blank" href="http://www.sohu.com/a/273568422_206804?scm=undefined&amp;_f=index_betapagehotnews_1&amp;spm=smpc.content.tw.1.1548666901115Aqjfpz4" data-spm-type="content" data-spm-data="1">暧昧，才是日本人的生存哲学</a>
    </h4>
    <p>
